attributes.action: contact the Israeli Government to stop the work on Islams third holiest place Masjid Al Aqsa.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Masjid Al Aqsa is the third holiest place for Muslims and it is Mr Blairs responsibility to do something about it. Represent the British Muslims and stop any potential outcome.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
